org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.NativeClass

type
class
This class exposes static method used to get instances of native class instance. Those native class instance are wrapped in a NativeInstance object abstracting instance manipulation

Static Methods

createInstanceOf(classReference : Class<Dynamic>) : NativeInstance

parameters
classReference the class reference to instantiate
returns
a NativeInstance object
Instantiate a native class from a class reference and wrap it in a NativeInstance object

getNativeInstanceByClassName(className : String) : NativeInstance

parameters
className the name of the native class to instantiate
returns
a NativeInstance object
Intantiate a native class with it's name and wrap it in a NativeInstance object
